```js
type internetCompany =
   | Facebook(string)
   | Google(string)
   | Twitter(string);
```

```js
type internetCompany = [ `Facebook(string) | `Google(string) | `Twitter(string) ];
type platformCompany = [ internetCompany | `Amazon(string) | `Uber(string) ]
```
